short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HowNow: Get the knowledge you need, where you need it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
From your workplace knowledge stored in shared folders, CRMs and helpdesks to expertly curated content, HowNow brings together all the knowledge you need in real-time and delivers it right where you need it.

Whether youâ€™re in your CRM or in your Inbox, install the HowNow Chrome Extension and seamlessly add a layer of knowledge to your entire workflow and increase your productivity. Get up-to-date product info, sales collateral, productivity hacks, best practices, onboarding manuals and more, without spending time searching and switching context.

HowNow works with any website and app opened in Chrome so you can surface the knowledge you need, right where you work.
